name: dovetail
title: Dovetail
description: Search for data in your Dovetail workspace from wherever you are.
author: barlow

commands.name: search-data
commands.title: Search Data
commands.description: Search for data across your workspace.

commands.name: search-insights
commands.title: Search Insights
commands.description: Search for insights across your workspace.

preferences.name: dovetailApiToken
preferences.title: Dovetail API key
preferences.description: Create a personal API key in your Dovetail account settings
preferences.placeholder: Enter your personal Dovetail API key

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
